attributes.action: Make Consitutional Change To Ensure That All Administrators Of The Law And All The Judiciary Will Receive Investigation And Punishment For Wrongdoings By A Publicly Accountable Independent Body
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is not sufficient to leave such matters upon the shoulders of the individual, nor is it satisfactory that these people remain above the law.

The UK public deserve a fair, accountable and transparent system to deal with abusers of the justice system and so ensure a proper justice system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
